description:
Run the ridge less traveled by. The LaSportiva Jackal lets you tackle the terrain where the wild things are. Its super-thick midsole is engineered for shock absorption over long or short distances. A varied outsole grabs the ground and protects from sharp edges, so you can channel your energy into gaining elevation and putting the miles behind you. With a protective toe cap and roomy mesh upper, these airy shoes are crafted for the feet of mountain runners. Cushion plus stability, it's the sky running dream.

  • Recycled engineered mesh upper with seamless thermo-adhesive TPU reinforcements for durability
  • Gusseted soft-stretch tongue moves with your foot
  • EVA midsoles cushion against repeated impacts on long runs
  • Infinitoo™ PU insert stabilizes your stride
  • Dual density EVA Rock-Guard protects the sole of your foot from sharp edges
  • TPU toe cap protects your toes
  • FriXion® XT 2.0 outsole with Impact Brake System for control and grip in rugged conditions
  • Wide fit for long distance trail running
name: La Sportiva Jackal II Trail Running Shoes - Men's
